name: Poltergeist
description: A simple game where i wanted to test an engine and find somewhere to start learning coding. Here is the product of that, my first game. Clearly needs polishing and can be improved a lot but for now this is what we have. Enjoy :) (Also sorry mobile users. It isn't able to be played by you. Forgot to delete text in menu :( ) You will also have to exit out after each death.
